ygData.subject: Re: Petition update
ygData.msgSnippet: Woohoo, I still agree.  Do I need to vote again? Death to all Orcs! - Patty of Halas just before Dvinn Backstabs her 4 times for 40 points and her lifeless
ygData.messageBody:
Woohoo, I still agree. Do I need to vote again?

"Death to all Orcs!"
- Patty of Halas just before Dvinn Backstabs her 4 times for 40 points
and her lifeless body slumps to the cold hard ground.


>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: [warriors_eq] Petition update
>Date: Wed, 23 Jun 1999 14:10:31 -0500
>
>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>
>The petition has been updated as follows.
>
>1. 6 points per level instead of 5. Some people thought 7 was too high.
>6
>allows combat skill to cap at about 300. Slightly higher than 255, but
>allowing 6 per level allows warrior to be better in melee combat before
>Level 41 when the skill cap would supposedly no longer be in effect
>
>2. Added that there needed to be a skill unique to warriors only. Weapon
>Specialization was the suggested ability.
>
>Trent Carroll
> Programmer
> Houston Baptist University
> (281) 649-3410
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
>http://www.onelist.com
>Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
>
